item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
For a quick cheatsheet, check out https://simplemde.com/markdown-guide.

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects A list of things I have done or am working on. In Progress Summer Research Project at Oxford Maths Institute. Finishing this website. Done Pycross - a picross game in Python (2020) Exeter Maths Certificate: Machine Learning Project (2020) Met Office Project (2019) Graph Theory Project (2018)
